channel.title: Make A Item have a certain amount of spec
channel.description:
Helo can anyone tell me how to make a specific item such as drager dagger (dds) have a specific amount of spec such as insted of the special bar taking 25% special i want it to take 50% special
Iv'e even tried to change it in the client.java here's my code i tried changing it to
[code]if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 282, 0x426); npcDamage(8);[/code]
As you can see i've changed the previous code 24 to 49
But for some reason it still takes
25% special. Can you please help me?
Thanks

item.title: Make A Item have a certain amount of spec
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Seirously lol i feel stupid thanks.
